title: Support Vector Machine in R | SVM Algorithm Explained with Example | Data Science in R | Simplilearn
excerpt: This Support Vector Machine in R tutorial video will help you understand what is Support Vector Machine (SVM in R), what is SVM kernel and you will also see a use case in which we will classify horses and mules from a given data set using SVM algorithm.
